ERRORS.QUIZ_NAME_LENGTH_MSG: Quiz name length should be minimum 3 maximum 50 characters
ERRORS.QUIZ_DECSRIPTION_LENGTH_MSG: Quiz description length should be minimum 3 maximum 255 characters
ERRORS.TIME_PATTERN: Time should be numeric and validate against minutes of the hour
ERRORS.TIME_COMPARE: Question time cannot be more than quiz time
ERRORS.TIME_LIMIT: Quiz time cannot be more than 300 minutes

LABELS.END_USER_OVERRIDE: End user can override the time limit
LABELS.USER_CHOOSE_QUESTION: End user can choose # of questions in the Quiz
LABELS.RANDOMIZE_ANSWER: Randomize answers with in a question

TOOLTIPS.MIN_TIME_LIMIT: Maximum time to complete the quiz (in minutes)
TOOLTIPS.QUESTION_TIME_LIMIT: Time limit for each question (in seconds)
